name: A Voyageur's Journey
description:
The game puts one in the hands of a voyageur back in the early settler days of Canada. Travelling through the rivers while transporting goods is a very tough and hardworking job for most people, and that was why the voyageurs enjoyed it.

  • Submitted as a ninth-grade social-studies assignment.
  • Received a perfect mark of 100%.

What others are saying about A Voyageurs Journey:

“You guys should check out Andrew’s game. It’s friggin’ amazing.” -Mr. Allan, Social Studies teacher
“haha, this is pretty cool” -omnimedium
